.github/workflows/deploy.yml: Empty GitHub Actions workflow file for deployment configuration.
backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the Weaver Catalog Portal, defining data types and query/update methods for user profiles, weaver profiles, products, and customers, with authorization checks via AccessControl mixin.
backend/migration.mo: Motoko migration module that defines old and new actor state types and a `run` function that upgrades state by adding the `nextProductId` map to the existing actor data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the fix for the 'failed to add product' error on the Catalog Management page, listing affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing short summaries of each frontend source file, describing the purpose and key implementation details of components, hooks, and pages.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment variable file for the frontend, showing required Vite variables for backend/frontend canister IDs and DFX network configuration.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS file importing Tailwind directives and defining CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens used throughout the UI.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Vite/React app, mounting the root div and loading the main TypeScript module for the Weaver Catalog Portal.
frontend/public/.nojekyll: Empty file that prevents GitHub Pages from processing the public directory with Jekyll.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app component setting up TanStack Router with hash-based history, defining weaver (authenticated) and public (unauthenticated) layout route trees, and wrapping the app in QueryClient and ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/components/CustomerForm.tsx: Dialog form component for adding or editing a customer, with fields for name, business name, contact number (10-digit validation), address, and customer type, plus inline error messages.
frontend/src/components/CustomerTypeDial: A modal dialog component that lets users select a customer type (retail, wholesale, or direct) from a list of styled buttons with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/FeatureSection.t: A static landing page section that displays four feature highlights (Catalog Management, Customer Portal, Smart Sharing, Mobile Friendly) in a responsive grid layout.
frontend/src/components/ImageGallery.tsx: An image gallery component that displays a main image with previous/next navigation buttons and a thumbnail strip for multi-image products using ExternalBlob URLs.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: A button component that handles Internet Identity login and logout, showing loading state during authentication and clearing the React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/LogoUpload.tsx: A circular logo upload component supporting drag-and-drop and file selection, with local preview, upload progress display, and removal functionality using ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/components/MultiImageUpload: A multi-image upload component that supports uploading up to a configurable maximum number of images, with reordering (move up/down), removal, and upload progress tracking via ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/components/PageLayout.tsx: A layout wrapper component that renders the responsive navigation bar, a main content area, and a footer with a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: A product card component that displays product image, price (based on customer type), stock status, and conditionally shows owner controls (edit, delete, stock toggle, share via clipboard or WhatsApp).
frontend/src/components/ProductForm.tsx: A dialog form component for creating or editing a product, handling fields like name, prices, images, visibility, stock, and colors with validation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that prompts a new user to enter their name to set up their profile on first login.
frontend/src/components/ResponsiveNav.ts: A sticky responsive navigation header with desktop links, mobile hamburger menu, share catalogue button, and login button for authenticated weavers.
frontend/src/components/ShareLinkCard.ts: A card component that displays a shareable URL with copy-to-clipboard and WhatsApp share buttons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider, managing login, logout, and identity persistence via DFINITY's AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for backend interactions including user profiles, weaver profiles, and product CRUD operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Tailwind directives and defines CSS custom properties for a traditional Indian textile-inspired color palette in both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogManagementPage: Page for authenticated weavers to manage their product catalog, supporting add, edit, delete, and stock toggle operations via backend mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerManagementPag: Page for managing a weaver's customer directory with a table view, supporting add, edit, and delete operations for retail, wholesale, and direct customers.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Marketing landing page with a hero section, feature highlights, and a CTA section; shows navigation to the catalog when the user is authenticated.
frontend/src/pages/PublicCatalogPage.tsx: Public-facing catalog page that displays a weaver's products filtered by customer type (retail/wholesale/direct) without requiring authentication.
frontend/src/pages/PublicProductDetailPa: Public-facing product detail page showing images, pricing based on customer type, and stock status for a single product without requiring authentication.
frontend/src/pages/ShareLinksPage.tsx: Renders a page displaying three shareable catalog URLs (retail, wholesale, direct) generated from the weaver's principal ID, each shown in a ShareLinkCard component with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/WeaverProfilePage.tsx: Provides a form for weavers to view and update their business profile (name, address, logo), loading existing data on mount and saving via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence and CustomerType parsing helpers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom OKLCH-based colors, serif/sans font families, border radii, box shadows, and accordion animations, using typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript configuration for the Node/Vite build environment, scoped to vite.config.js with ESNext module resolution.
project_state.json: Project state metadata file tracking the current fix request to diagnose and resolve the 'failed to add product' error on the Catalog Management page.
